channel.title: Please help, error's.. :\
channel.description:
I get this error when i try to run my server (server side of it)
[code]Loaded clipmap in 440ms. [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: Launching HyBriD PvP... [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: java.io.IOE xception: Unable to establish loopback connection [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(Unknown Sour ce) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(Unknown Source)
[11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Unkno wn Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:139) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: Caused by: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: bind [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: ... 12 more Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
im sure someone know's what is wrong, please get back to me :\ please and thank you :3

item.title: Please help, error's.. :\
item.dc:creator: @ivbaseball10 ivbaseball10
item.description:
@ivbaseball10 wrote:

I get this error when i try to run my server (server side of it)

[code]Loaded clipmap in 440ms.
[11/24/11 11:01 PM]: Launching HyBriD PvP…
[11/24/11 11:01 PM]: Exception in thread “main” [11/24/11 11:01 PM]: java.io.IOE
xception: Unable to establish loopback connection
[11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source)

thod)

ce)

[11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.(Unknown Source)

[11/24/11 11:01 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Unkno
wn Source)

tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162)

ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141)

address: bind

e)

[11/24/11 11:01 PM]: … 12 more
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

im sure someone know’s what is wrong, please get back to me :\ please and thank you :3
